bug.author: zhanpenghe
bug.description: Currently, some policies are following the tf tree and returns actions and agent_infos while some of them don't. I think we should just unify this and just follow the tf tree. Can one of you take over this? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lywong92>@lywong92</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yonghyuc>@yonghyuc</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Sure, I can work on it.
